outcomes_json: {"success": {"text": "你诚恳道歉并处理妥当，顾客情绪缓和，还愿意再给一次机会。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -100}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": 5}, {"scope": "bag_weight", "target": {"bag_id": "customer_conflict"}, "op": "mul", "value": 0.8, "duration_turns": 4}, {"scope": "event_weight", "target": {"tags_any": ["投诉"]}, "op": "mul", "value": 0.7, "duration_turns": 4}]}, "fail": {"text": "顾客不接受解释，在社交媒体发帖吐槽，你的声誉受损。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -10}, {"scope": "flag", "target": "customer_angry", "op": "add", "value": 1, "duration_turns": 6}]}}

{"success": {"text": "顾客接受了折扣，态度缓和。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -60}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": 2}]}, "fail": {"text": "顾客仍不满意，继续投诉。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -4}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 3}]}}

{"success": {"text": "对方被说服，愿意停止争执。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": 1}]}, "fail": {"text": "矛盾升级，出现差评扩散。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -8}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 5}]}}

{"success": {"text": "差评逐步减少，口碑回升。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -2000}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": 3}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 2}, {"scope": "shop_stat", "target": {"shop": "main", "stat": "rating"}, "op": "add", "value": 0.2}]}, "fail": {"text": "投入有了，但效果不明显。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -1500}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -2}, {"scope": "shop_stat", "target": {"shop": "main", "stat": "rating"}, "op": "add", "value": -0.1}]}}

{"success": {"text": "申诉成功，部分差评被下架。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -500}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": 1}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 3}]}, "fail": {"text": "平台不支持，反而引来更多关注。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -6}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 4}]}}

{"success": {"text": "你拿到了较好的价格。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -12000}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 3}]}, "fail": {"text": "价格没有谈下来，资金依然被占用。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -8000}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 2}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -1}]}}

{"success": {"text": "新供应商价格更低，但磨合期紧张。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": 2000}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 4}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -2}, {"scope": "shop_stat", "target": {"shop": "main", "stat": "rating"}, "op": "add", "value": -0.1}]}, "fail": {"text": "供应不稳定，口碑受损。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -3000}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -4}]}}

{"success": {"text": "团购带来可观订单。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": 6000}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 4}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": 3}, {"scope": "shop_stat", "target": {"shop": "main", "stat": "rating"}, "op": "add", "value": 0.2}]}, "fail": {"text": "沟通成本太高，效果一般。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": 1000}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -3}]}}

{"success": {"text": "试单推进顺利。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": 2500}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": 1}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 2}]}, "fail": {"text": "试单流于形式，没有复购。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -1}]}}

{"success": {"text": "临时工勉强能顶住。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -1500}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 2}]}, "fail": {"text": "临时工失误，顾客不满。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -3000}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 3}, {"scope": "shop_stat", "target": {"shop": "main", "stat": "rating"}, "op": "add", "value": -0.2}]}}

{"success": {"text": "你保住了团队状态，但损失部分营业额。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -2500}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": -2}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "health", "op": "add", "value": 1}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -1}]}, "fail": {"text": "", "effects": []}}

{"success": {"text": "还能勉强撑住一周。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -2000}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 4}, {"scope": "shop_stat", "target": {"shop": "main", "stat": "rating"}, "op": "add", "value": -0.2}]}, "fail": {"text": "故障扩大，损失更大。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -5000}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 6}, {"scope": "shop_stat", "target": {"shop": "main", "stat": "rating"}, "op": "add", "value": -0.4}]}}

{"success": {"text": "借到设备，缓解了压力。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -3000}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "stress", "op": "add", "value": 3}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": 1}]}, "fail": {"text": "无人愿意帮忙，关系受损。", "effects": [{"scope": "stat", "target": "cash", "op": "add", "value": -1000}, {"scope": "stat", "target": "reputation", "op": "add", "value": -2}]}}
